name: Composite ID Number And Name
description:
This data type is used when identifying a person both as a coded value and with a text name.  For specific fields, individual sites may elect to omit the ID or the name.  

Example:
|12372^RIGGINS^JOHN^""^""^""^MD^ADT1|
|12372^^^^^^^ADT1|
|^RIGGINS^JOHN^""^""^""^MD|

fields.name: Id Number
fields.description: Coded ID according to a user-defined table, defined by the 8th component. If the first component is present, either the source table or the assigning authority must be valued.

fields.name: Suffix
fields.description: Used to specify a name suffix (e.g., Jr. or III).

fields.name: Prefix
fields.description: Used to specify a name prefix (e.g., Dr.).

fields.name: Degree
fields.description: Used to specify an educational degree (e.g., MD). Refer to user-defined table 0360 Degree for suggested values.

fields.name: Source Table
fields.description: User-defined table 0297 - CN ID source is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for this component. Used to delineate the first component.

fields.name: Assigning Authority
fields.description: The assigning authority is a unique identifier of the system (organization or agency or department) that creates the data. It is a HD data type. User-defined table 0363 Assigning authority is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for the first sub-component of the HD data type, namespace ID.
